version_description:
Just in time for the holidays, we’re gifting you a few fixes:

* You can edit member roles—give your group more (or less!) control
* Big data user? Now you can set alerts for you or someone else on your plan
* We polished up the app and squish
Happy holidays from Fi! Our latest update includes order tracking (that’s one less delivery you have to worry about), plus festive illustrations and a limited-time gift.

We want your Fi experience to be extra-fine. These updates are small, but the small stuff matters:

• Support for child-friendly accounts
• Ability to invite others to earn Fi credit
• More in-app voicemail settings
• Smoother support chats

We’re March-ing forward with a new Fi update. Here’s what’s new:
• Got feedback? We’ve added customer satisfaction surveys (and you can always send feedback from the Support tab!)
• Improvements to make your bill easier to understand
• Bug fixes

• Visual voicemail (yes, finally!). Now your voicemails show up in a list, and you can listen, read the transcripts or reply—right from the app
• Some slicker animations and transitions, which you’ll probably only notice subconsciously
• As always,
With this update, you can add a new member directly from the app. Sweet!
With this release, we added the option to record custom voicemail greetings. So get creative—and please leave a message after the beep.
Get the latest update for improved spam call detection and blocking (and save yourself from an awkward chat with a robo-marketer).
Just a couple of tweaks to make your Fi account easier to manage.
The new Unlimited plan is now available, and existing customers can schedule a plan switch in the app anytime.
Just a couple of fixes to make your experience better.
We launched our new Unlimited plan back in September. In this version, we gave it a little extra design love.
Happy holidays from Fi! Our latest update includes order tracking (that’s one less delivery you have to worry about), plus festive illustrations and a limited-time gift.
In this release, we cleaned up a few bugs. Not quite Oscar-worthy, but nominated for Best Supporting Update.
In this update, we added the option to set up call forwarding—so if someone calls your Fi number, a different phone will ring. Magic!
We've been hard at work fixing bugs & improving the app. We hope you like it!
To keep the Fi app healthy, we’ve been making minor updates, squashing bugs, and washing our hands for 30 seconds minimum.
We made some minor updates to keep the Fi app running smoothly
This update includes a new option for self-serve support, so you can easily find answers to your questions
You can now activate Fi via eSIM on select iPhone® devices.
You can now activate Fi via eSIM on select iPhone® devices.
This release includes some minor polish and improvements. Please note that Fi will no longer support iOS 11 going forward.
With this release, Google Voice now works with Google Fi, so you can have separate Fi & Voice numbers on the same Google account.
This release includes a few improvements to make your Fi experience even better.
This release includes a few improvements to make your Fi experience even better.
We made the Fi app just a little bit cuter.
We made the Fi app just a little bit cuter.
We made the Fi app just a little bit better.
We made the Fi app just a little bit better.
